languages.text: "Они уже остановили тринадцать агрокомплексов и перешли к покушениям... Стража без устали выслеживает бунтовщиков, но их предводители по-прежнему ускользают от нас".

traits.locale_text: "Служба безопасности без устали ведет войну с бунтовщиками, но их предводители по прежнему ускользают от нас. Они уже остановили два агрокомплекса, а теперь еще и организовали сегодняшнее покушение... Давайте взглянем на ситуацию трезво: даже самые талантливые логисты Администратума не состоянии гарантировать стабильные подати и сопутствующие поставки, когда шатлы опасаются садиться в космопорту, а запуганная чернь потакает опасному меньшинству в своих рядах".

languages.text: "They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."
languages.original_text: "Они уже остановили тринадцать агрокомплексов и перешли к покушениям... Стража без устали выслеживает бунтовщиков, но их предводители по-прежнему ускользают от нас".

traits.locale_text: "My guards are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again. Let us consider the situation dispassionately: even the most talented logistics experts of the Administratum are unable to guarantee stable tithes and supplies when shuttles are threatening to land at the spaceport, and the terrified peasants are indulging a dangerous minority within their ranks."

"They had already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and moved on to assassination attempts. My guards are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

"My guards are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again. Let us consider the situation dispassionately: even the most talented logistics experts of the Administratum are unable to guarantee stable tithes and supplies when shuttles are threatening to land at the spaceport, and the terrified peasants are indulging a dangerous minority within their ranks."

"They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My guards are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

"They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

"They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

languages.text: “那些叛军已经让十三个综合农业中心停摆，现在又展开了暗杀行动。我的守卫正在努力地追查叛军，但他们的领袖一次又一次地从我们手中逃脱。”
languages.original_text: "They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

traits.locale_text: “那些叛军已经让十三个综合农业中心停摆，现在又展开了暗杀行动。我的守卫正在努力地追查叛军，但他们的领袖一次又一次地从我们手中逃脱。”

languages.text: «Ya han detenido la operación de 13 complejos agrícolas y ahora han pasado a los intentos de asesinato. Mis guardias persiguen sin descanso a los rebeldes, pero sus líderes logran huir una y otra vez».
languages.original_text: "They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

traits.locale_text: «Ya han detenido la operación de 13 complejos agrícolas y ahora han pasado a los intentos de asesinato. Mis guardias persiguen sin descanso a los rebeldes, pero sus líderes logran huir una y otra vez».

languages.text: 「異端者はすでに13の農業設備を停止させており、今や暗殺計画に軸足を移しています。私のワーデンが根気強く反乱軍を追跡していますが、首謀者にはまた逃げられています」
languages.original_text: "They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者はすでに13の農業設備を停止させており、今や暗殺計画に軸足を移しています。私のワーデンが根気強く反乱軍を追跡していますが、首謀者にはまた逃げられています」

languages.text: "Sie haben bereits 13 Agri-Komplexe außer Betrieb gesetzt und führen mittlerweile Attentatsversuche durch. Meine Wächter bringen die Rebellen beharrlich zur Strecke, aber ihre Anführer entwischen uns immer wieder."
languages.original_text: "They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben bereits 13 Agri-Komplexe außer Betrieb gesetzt und führen mittlerweile Attentatsversuche durch. Meine Wächter bringen die Rebellen beharrlich zur Strecke, aber ihre Anführer entwischen uns immer wieder."

languages.text: « Non contents d'avoir causé la cessation d'activité de treize agri-complexes, ils sont maintenant passés à des tentatives d'assassinat. Mes gardiens traquent ces rebelles sans relâche, mais leurs chefs continuent à nous éluder. »
languages.original_text: "They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

traits.locale_text: « Non contents d'avoir causé la cessation d'activité de treize agri-complexes, ils sont maintenant passés à des tentatives d'assassinat. Mes gardiens traquent ces rebelles sans relâche, mais leurs chefs continuent à nous éluder. »

languages.text: "13 tarım kompleksinde işler durma noktasına geldi, şimdi de suikast girişimlerine başladılar. Dizdarlarım, gece gündüz isyancıların izini sürüyor lakin önderlerini bir türlü yakalayamıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "They have already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and have now moved on to assassination attempts. My wardens are doggedly tracking down the rebels, but their leaders are slipping from our grasp yet again."

traits.locale_text: "13 tarım kompleksinde işleri sekteye uğrattılar, şimdi de suikast girişimlerine başladılar. Muhafızlarım gece gündüz isyancıların izini sürüyor lakin önderlerini bir türlü yakalayamıyoruz."
